artist: Artist: Sheila Hicks; Artist: Toshio Sekiji; Artist: Kim Schuefftan
description: Piece of linen fabric, collaged with bast fibers, fabric, paper and folded to form pages of a book. Jacket/dustcover created from linen fabric with added tabs to secure book.
dimension: 13 1/2 x 14 1/4 in. (34.29 x 36.2 cm) (folded, in cover)

medium: Bast, linen, silk; collage, and embroidery
title: Love of Linen (Amour de l’Ama)
